articles.description: Researchers from the University at Buffalo have developed a new strontium-loaded scaffold that can be customised to fit any size dental implant and may aid in patient healing and tissue attachment. The new study, published earlier in the Journal of Biomedical…

articles.title: CDC director begging public to get flu and COVID vaccines as cases soar - 11Alive
articles.description: Rates of the flu are currently higher than the country has seen in a decade, as deaths because of the virus have totaled more than all of last year.
